author: roquestrew

comments.content:
[Baskerville Old Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828114156/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=baskerville%20old%20face&sample_text=everything&sample_size=74)

Another interpretation, with a less awkward ’g’, is [Fry’s Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828114156/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/frys_baskerville_roman_ot/)

Check the “kn” kern. Ouch. You can see the problem with tight-but-not-touching spacing, especially in a face like this.
